error.signature: RuntimeError: The NVIDIA driver on your system is too old
error.regex: NVIDIA driver.*too old|CUDA driver version is insufficient|Driver Version.*CUDA

verdict.summary: Installed CUDA toolkit requires a newer GPU driver. Driver must meet minimum version for CUDA.

dead_ends.why_fails: CUDA toolkit is fine â€” the GPU driver needs updating

dead_ends.action: Downgrade PyTorch to match old driver
dead_ends.why_fails: Old PyTorch misses important features and bug fixes

workarounds.action: Update GPU driver: apt install nvidia-driver-545 or download from nvidia.com
workarounds.how: ubuntu-drivers autoinstall  # or: apt install nvidia-driver-545

workarounds.action: Check the CUDA/driver compatibility matrix to find minimum driver version

frequently_confused_with.distinction: Both produce similar messages, but 'cuda-driver-insufficient' and 'cuda-capability-error' differ in root cause and environment context.
